newsitem.title: ITALY: SOCCER-SAVICEVIC AND CONTE GET TWO-MATCH BANS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-SAVICEVIC AND CONTE GET TWO-MATCH BANS.

text.p: Milan's Montenegrin attacker Dejan Savicevic and Juventus midfielder Antonio Conte were given two-match bans on Wednesday after being sent off in a friendly between the two serie A sides last month.
The two were involved in a second half scuffle in the friendly between European Cup winners Juventus and the Italian champions in Milan on August 21. The home team won 1-0.
The bans mean the two will miss the opening serie A matches this weekend but not European Cup games in midweek.
